summary: Fix Snow in the College of Winterhold
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/skyrim-college-of-winterhold-fix-snow][img]http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/College-of-Winterhold-fix-snow.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][youtube]-afj-6w2vwQ[/youtube][/center]

[center][size=6][color=silver][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=gray][size=3][b]This mod improves the snow that settles on the walls, towers and bridge in the College of Winterhold[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=6][color=silver][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=gray][size=3][b]requires skyrim updated to version 1.9.32.0[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=6][color=silver][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=gray][b]Extract the contents of the zipped file into your Skyrim/folder and put the check at - College_Fix_Snow - in the selector mod[/b][/color][/center]

[center][size=6][color=silver][b]Compatibility:[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=gray][b]lore friendly and compatible with any mod on skyrimnexus ..
fully compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36849/?]Immersive College of Winterhold[/url]
also compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10383/?]Better Dinamic Snow[/url] just upload it below in the loader[/b][/color][/center]




[center][img]http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Skyrim-College-Fix-Snow.png[/img]
[img]http://www.al-partners.com/images/ita.gif[/img]Per la guida in italiano della mod andate [url=http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/skyrim-college-of-winterhold-fix-snow]QUA[/url]
[size=3][color=black]---------------------------------------------------------->[/color][/size][/center]
author: Master85
